extracted_playbook.title: Install Patch Scripts for MACH PS700 v2 System
extracted_playbook.description: Install patch scripts to safely remove the software causing the vulnerability in the MACH PS700 v2 System.

extracted_playbook.title: Contact Local Account Team for Remediation Strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Contact the local account team for further information on possible remediation and mitigation strategies due to the complexity of individual implementation of the project.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the Internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Control System Networks Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use more secure methods, such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs). Ensure VPNs are updated to the most recent version available.

extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Recommended Cybersecurity Strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as detailed in CISA's resources.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity to CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report findings to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
